title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Mike Silver on Kyler Commitment, Matt Mosley on Cowboys Camp, Big Ben ‘Coddled’ Comments with Ike Taylor
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Mike Silver on Kyler Commitment, Matt Mosley on Cowboys Camp, Big Ben ‘Coddled’ Comments with Ike Taylor
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, (3:00) his top takes of the week, including why he's defending Kyler Murray over 'study clause' criticism, and why Big Ben is in no position to question the commitment of younger players.

Then, (19:00) longtime NFL writer - and host of the Open Mike podcast - Mike Silver on if Kyler Murray’s film study clause is really a red flag, and if the Niners are internally concerned about Trey Lance taking over at QB.

Next, (35:00) longtime Cowboys columnist - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley is in Oxnard discussing Jerry Jones creating early distractions with his backhanded ‘vote of confidence’ for Mike McCarthy, if the Cowboys window is already closing, what it would take for Mike McCarthy to get fired during the season, and if Dak’s production will suffer without Amari Cooper.

Finally, (56:00) 2-time Super Bowl Champ former Steelers Cornerback Ike Taylor on if Mitchell Trubisky or Kenny Pickett has the edge in the camp QB battle, and if Big Ben is out of line for calling current players 'coddled.’

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
